duties_responsibilities.duty: Build the largest community of arts, crafts, and culinary class teachers across Portland and the US.
Cold-call new partners across arts and crafts class providers, cooking schools, and mixologists/cocktail class providers.
Travel to new cities to recruit new partners when appropriate.
Use the latest sales tools to effectively manage the sales funnel and pipeline management.
Work closely with the team based in Sydney, Australia and report directly to the ClassBento Partnerships Manager.
Be a team player with a proven track record of working well in teams.
